HIV.name: HIV
HIV.Description: HIV test to detect HIV infection in the blood

Hepatitis B & C Test.name: Hepatitis B & C Test
Hepatitis B & C Test.Description: Test to detect Hepatitis B and C infections in the blood

Thyroid Function Tests.name: Thyroid Function Tests
Thyroid Function Tests.Description: Test to evaluate thyroid hormone levels in the blood

Complete Blood Count.name: Complete Blood Count
Complete Blood Count.Description: Test to measure the number of different blood cells in a blood sample

Urinalysis.name: Urinalysis
Urinalysis.Description: Test to assess the components of urine and detect possible kidney or urinary tract disorders

Pregnancy Test.name: Pregnancy Test
Pregnancy Test.Description: Test to detect the hormone human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) for pregnancy detection

Vitamin D Test.name: Vitamin D Test
Vitamin D Test.Description: Test to measure the level of Vitamin D in the blood

STD Test.name: STD Test
STD Test.Description: Test to detect various sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) in the blood

Blood Glucose Test.name: Blood Glucose Test
Blood Glucose Test.Description: Test to measure glucose levels in the blood, used to diagnose diabetes

Lipid Profile.name: Lipid Profile
Lipid Profile.Description: Test to measure cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood

Blood Cultures.name: Blood Cultures
Blood Cultures.Description: Test to detect bacterial or fungal infections in the blood

Serum.name: Serum
Serum.Description: Test to measure various biomarker levels in serum samples
